data.title: NOVA
data.okr_1: Make the computer more useful, by providing the means for a non technical user, to manage data, transform it in information, and make automations.
data.okr_2: User should be abble to manage their expenses in NOVA over a spreadsheet
data.okr_2_kr_1: User can manage their expenses data manually
data.okr_2_kr_2: User can answer how much he has to pay in a certain month
data.okr_2_kr_3: User can automate to receive an email in the morning when he has any account to pay that day
